front.name: Magicked
front.desc:
//"Be careful. If anything in the forest looks edible, it's a faerie trap" -- Woody
A spell or other supernatural power is affecting you.
It might cause discomfort, distraction, or inconvenience. Your perceptions might be twisted somehow.
You must be careful when doing things that would set off the spell.
You can spend a scene in ritual or contrite behavior to free yourself of the magic.
prompts: Magical prohibitions against entering or leaving a place
Vexing problems, minor bad luck, or other trickery
front.rule: Flip to worsen the condition and get a hit. Discard by spending a scene attending to the condition.

back.name: Cursed
back.desc:
//"That berry was delicious. Hey, who are all of you?" -- Emory
A powerful and baneful magic has you in its grip.
You might be under a geas or other powerful compulsion, to act or not act in a certain way.
The rules of the curse may be a mystery. You may suffer pain or great misfortune violating them.
You may need to carry protective items, or perform ritual actions, to keep the effect at bay, until you find a way to lift the curse.
prompts: Ill fortune or calamity follows you
A taboo against doing some common thing
Love potions, gibberish speech, or other maledictions
back.rule: Discard by spending downtime attending to the condition.
